src:
AP Top Science News at 1:16 a.m. EST
07 Nov 2019, 05:00 by EndPlay
New Zealand passes law aimed at combating climate change
Iconic Pacific bird sanctuary ravaged by plastic and death
Standing tall: Scientists find oldest example of upright ape
High-tech chestnuts: US to consider genetically altered tree
CERN appoints Gianotti, first female chief, to second term
Mexico finds human-built 'mammoth traps' 15,000 years old
Schools reopen in New Delhi with air pollution falling
EU hopes US will rethink choice to pull out of climate pact
Boeing crew capsule completes major flight test in desert
Wine cellar in space: 12 bottles arrive for year of aging
Copyright 2019 The Associated Press. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.
